about_the_game:
《Let's go! Brave》is a 2D action adventure game in the dark fantasy style of Galaxy Warrior Demon City, featuring sexy characters and lively battles. Its unique purification gameplay is also exhilarating, and of course, it also has a gripping storyline


story

The story takes place in a different world where gods and demons compete. The goddess, as the spokesperson of the universe, engages in a prolonged and intense battle with the Seven Demons, who represent the seven deadly sins. The Seven Witches spread a plague on the human world and launched a surprise attack while the Goddess expended her divine power to save humanity, causing the Goddess and Saint Angels to retreat and be about to be wiped out by the evil demon army. The goddess summoned the brave with her final strength, as the last hope of humanity, to fight against the witch in the final battle.

Exploring a world where danger and treasure coexist

The world polluted by the witch is full of danger. But there are also many treasures and secrets waiting for players to search.

Featured purification gameplay

After defeating the monster, players can choose to purify the monster, and the purified monster can even be used by players.
